name: Mia Dolan
description: A bright-eyed dreamer working as a barista on the Warner Bros. studio lot, attending countless auditions while hoping for her big break in Hollywood.
quote: People love what other people are passionate about.
traits: She embodies the struggle of every artist who dares to dream big in a city that demands everything.

name: Sebastian Wilder
description: A purist jazz pianist who dreams of opening his own jazz club while playing background music in restaurants to make ends meet.
traits: He represents the dying art of pure jazz in a world that prefers commercial success over artistic integrity.
